title: Why are social sciences important? - Quora

response.answer_text: Have you ever used Google? If not, the social sciences are probably not important. Otherwise, the Page Rank algorithm was created by Sergei Brin and Larry Page. It is based on social network analysis, formed by social scientists. Just about everything you do is affected to some degree by social scientists. You may not always realize it, because it’s embedded in the decisions of your country’s institutions, but they are there.

There are so many reasons, but I’m struck most frequently by the mistakes made by leaders of all kinds when they fail to design solutions built from an understanding of real human:group behaviors, and instead make plans to which many will not respond as thought.
